page.title: 12Whitminster Childrens Games.
page.content:
{Hospital Tag.}
Hospital Tag can sometimes seem to be a rather silly game. As many people can play as are wanted. One person is{ IT. He or she has to count up to ten and then chase after everyone else who is playing the game. When somebody is caught he/she has to hold whatever part of their body they were caught by, <e.g. legs, arms, fingers, head>. When three people have been caught the first person who was caught becomes IT.
A final Tag type game that is very popular is{British Bulldog.
This is a rough game and people can get hurt.
Continued on page 13.
